events.title: Programming books
events.description: This day we'll spend time going through programming books and their exercises. This will include learning new technologies, languages and ideas.

events.title: BrokenInformant
events.description: A productivity tool written in F# used to submit your TODOs as GitHub issues.

events.title: Schedule website
events.description: During this stream I'll be working on improving this website containing the schedule.

events.title: RapidTunes
events.description: Music application written in Java with the goal to bring as many music sources as possible together.

events.title: F# Compiler
events.description: I am working on an issue for the F# compiler, if there is something to do this day will be reserved for work on that. If not we'll work on some random stuff this day.
